control.visible: [Window.IsActive(videolibrary) + Skin.HasSetting(videomovies) + ![Skin.HasSetting(multiwallinfooff) | Skin.HasSetting(multiwallinfotrigger)] + [Control.HasFocus(556) | Control.HasFocus(71) | ControlGroup(7000).HasFocus()] + [!Container(556).OnNext + !Container(556).OnPrevious]] | [Window.IsActive(videolibrary) + Skin.HasSetting(videotv) + ![Skin.HasSetting(multiwalltvinfooff) | Skin.HasSetting(multiwalltvinfotrigger)] + [Control.HasFocus(556) | Control.HasFocus(71) | ControlGroup(7000).HasFocus()] + [!Container(556).OnNext + !Container(556).OnPrevious]] | [[Window.IsActive(musicplaylist) | Window.IsActive(musicfiles) | Window.IsActive(musiclibrary)] + [[[Container.Content(artists) | Container.Content(albums)] + [!Container(556).OnNext + !Container(556).OnPrevious]] | Container.Content(songs)] + ![Skin.HasSetting(multiwallmusicinfooff) | Skin.HasSetting(multiwallmusicinfotrigger)] + [Control.HasFocus(556) | Control.HasFocus(71) | ControlGroup(7000).HasFocus()]]
